name: @ericooliveira/lib-file-convert
description: Lib to generate .csv or .xlsx files from data collections in json format.

scripts.test: cross-env NODE_PATH=. NODE_ENV=LOCAL mocha --config test/.mocharc.unit.json --reporter mocha-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=test/reporter.unit.config.json --exit
scripts.coverage: cross-env NODE_PATH=. NODE_ENV=LOCAL nyc mocha --config test/.mocharc.unit.json --reporter mocha-multi-reporters --exit
scripts.coverage:details: cross-env NODE_PATH=. NODE_ENV=LOCAL nyc --reporter=text mocha --config test/.mocharc.unit.json --reporter mocha-multi-reporters --exit

author: Ã‰rico de Oliveira Leandro <erico.leandro@compasso.com.br>

hooks.pre-commit: npm run audit && npm run lint-fix && npm run test
